CardData.FlavorText: And there they stand to this day, all alone, unless the birds perch on them; for trolls, as you probably know, must be underground before dawn, or they go back to the stuff of the mountains they are made of, and never move again. â€”The Hobbit

Localization.Title: Delay until Dawn
Localization.Text:
Dawn breaks and turns
the Trolls to stone!
